 while his young attendant (depicted on the other side of the cup) prepares a drink for him on the stove.  On its interior
 enclosed within two concentric circles in the central medallion is a simplified mountain amidst shrouds of clouds.

sgcool_label_text:This small bowl is painted with a robed figure reclining against a rock. On the other side of the bowl
 a young attendant seems to be preparing a drink for his master by a stove. Many similarly-sized bowls with designs sketchily-executed in underglaze blue were recovered from the Hatcher shipwreck
 an Asian ship that sank in the South China Sea around 1643. While many bowls of this less refined quality were exported overseas
 they have also been excavated in China and were probably used for drinking tea.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This small bowl is painted with a robed figure reclining against a rock. On the other side of the bowl, a young attendant seems to be preparing a drink for his master by a stove. Many similarly-sized bowls with designs sketchily-executed in underglaze blue were recovered from the Hatcher shipwreck, an Asian ship that sank in the South China Sea around 1643. While many bowls of this less refined quality were exported overseas, they have also been excavated in China and were probably used for drinking tea.
